## PBReflection.tag() method

Creates a new tag by specifying a function to get the tagged variable

**Signature:**

```typescript
tag(name: string, getter: PBReflectionTagGetter): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The tag name |
|  getter | [PBReflectionTagGetter](doc/markdown/./device.pbreflectiontaggetter.md) | The getter function |

**Returns:**

void
